New Dream Hunter Rem: Setsuriku no Muden: Rem is an ordinary woman in our world but, in the world of dreams, she becomes a dream warrior, defending humanity from the evils there. When dream demons reach the waking world, she fights them with the help of her pets which transform into a tiger and wolf.
['New Dream Hunter Rem: Yume no Kishitachi']
